update MANAGE_RENT_CONTRACT
HOUSE_INFO_ID = #{houseInfoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MIDDLEMAN = #{middleman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COUNTY = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEAL_HOUSE_ADDRESS = #{dealHouseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MONTHLY_PRICE = #{monthlyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REALIZED_INCOME_CUSTOMER = #{realizedIncomeCustomer,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CUSTOMER_BROKERAGE_REMARK = #{customerBrokerageRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REALIZED_INCOME_OWNE = #{realizedIncomeOwne,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROPRIETOR_BROKERAGE_REMARK = #{proprietorBrokerageRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPRIETOR = #{proprietor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPRIETOR_CALL = #{proprietorCall,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPRIETOR_IDENTITY_CARD = #{proprietorIdentityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_IDENTITY_CARD = #{customerIdentityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPRIETOR_FIXATION_PHONE = #{proprietorFixationPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_CALL = #{customerCall,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_FIXATION_PHONE = #{customerFixationPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIRE_START_TIME = #{hireStartTime,jdbcType=DATE},
HIRE_END_TIME = #{hireEndTime,jdbcType=DATE},
BARGAIN_HOUSE_PHONE = #{bargainHousePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_DISCOUNT = #{customerDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROPRIETOR_DISCOUNT = #{proprietorDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROPRIETOR_DISCOUNT_RMK = #{proprietorDiscountRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_DISCOUNT_RMK = #{customerDiscountRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPERTY_RIGH_CARD = #{propertyRighCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACTORAGE = #{factorage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TAXES = #{taxes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OTHER_FORMALITIES = #{otherFormalities,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_COLLECTION = #{isCollection,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INVOICE_TITLE = #{invoiceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYMENT_CYCLE = #{paymentCycle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GATHERING_MODE = #{gatheringMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAYMENT_MODE = #{paymentMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LESSOR_ACCOUNT = #{lessorAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPENING_BANK = #{openingBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_ADDRESS = #{customerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DEBT_INVOICE = #{isDebtInvoice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AGENT_BUSINESS = #{agentBusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_CODE = #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

mapper.select: select a.merger_name as mergerName, a.name as county,a.id as baseAreaId from base_area a left join base_building b on b.area_id = a.id left join base_house c on c.building_id = b.id left join house_info d on d.ROOM_ID = c.id where d.id = #{houseInfoId}
